author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Logic Workflow – Where Proven Expertise Meets AI Automation | User | times-online.com
text:
Logic Workflow – Where Proven Expertise Meets AI Automation
Orlando, Florida, United States - December 29, 2023 —
Discover Logic Workflow , a mix of advanced AI technology and a decade of digital agency mastery. Emerging from the portfolio built by Cortes Ventures , we stand out in the AI arena, offering not just new solutions, but proven methods for smarter business operations.
Over A Decade Of Online Success
Our journey is unique – a venture grown internally, harnessing the expertise gained from running a portfolio of multiple successful digital agencies since 2012. We are now sharing our secrets and implementing these tried-and-true tactics to benefit your business directly.
Our distinct advantage comes from our origins. Logic Workflow isn’t a start-up guessing at success – it’s a mature venture built on a solid track record of real-world results. Our approach to AI and automation is defined by proven successes, ensuring we deliver impactful solutions.
Logic Workflow's Promise Of Profitable Efficiency
Logic Workflow goes beyond traditional automation. We focus on practical AI automations that drive efficiency and boost profits. Our aim is clear: Enhancing your business's performance in measurable, profitable ways.
During the initial launch, we are offering free consulting where you get the following:
Insights into Real Business Impact : Delve deep into your processes to discover impactful AI applications. Customized Strategies for Your Business : Receive strategies tailored to your unique business needs. ROI-Driven Solutions : Align our AI solutions with your financial goals for maximum benefit. Proven Strategies at Your Fingertips : Access strategies that have been refined and validated in our portfolio companies. A No-Risk Introduction to Our Expertise : Experience our services with no commitment, showcasing our capabilities. Join The AI Evolution
Partner with Logic Workflow and be part of a movement that redefines business efficiency.
Backed by a legacy of digital success, we offer you a blend of innovative technology and time-tested strategies. Let’s work together to elevate your business to new heights of efficiency and profitability. Claim now your free AI automation consulting: https://logicworkflow.com

Providing accurate and dependable information remains our utmost priority.

author: @infoitinterno
title: Nuova ondata di caldo in arrivo: Caronte porta temperature estreme
text: [ ](/a/2B70E7FB-03EE-43C6-97E6-0E31B95BBDB2/Meteo-Prossima-Settimana-nuova-fiammata-africana-con-Caronte-superstar-vediamo-quanto-durera) [Leggi](https://www.ilmeteo.it/notizie/meteo-prossima-settimana-nuova-fiammata-africana-con-caronte-superstar-vediamo-quanto-durer-17374950) La prossima settimana, l'Italia sarà colpita da una nuova ondata di caldo eccezionale, causata dall'anticiclone "Caronte". Questo fenomeno meteorologico, di origine sub-tropicale, porterà temperature elevate e condizioni climatiche anomale. L'anticiclone Caronte, proveniente dal deserto del Sahara, porterà un aumento significativo delle temperature in tutta Italia. Le masse d'aria calda, unite al sole intenso, faranno salire i valori termici a livelli estremi. Secondo le previsioni, questa nuova fase di caldo intenso durerà per diversi giorni, con picchi di temperatura che potrebbero superare i 40 gradi in alcune regioni. L'ondata di caldo di luglio 2024 ha evidenziato gli effetti tangibili del cambiamento climatico indotto dall'uomo. Secondo uno studio del World Weather Attribution, le temperature raggiunte sarebbero state praticamente impossibili senza il riscaldamento globale causato dalla combustione di combustibili fossili. Questo fenomeno mette in luce la necessità di adottare misure urgenti per contrastare il cambiamento climatico e ridurre le emissioni di gas serra. A Firenze, l'allerta da bollino rosso è stata estesa fino a domani, venerdì 2 agosto. Questo significa che la città ha registrato temperature superiori ai 35 gradi per 18 giorni consecutivi. Il bollettino elaborato dal dipartimento di epidemiologia SSR Regione Lazio, nell'ambito del sistema operativo nazionale di previsione e prevenzione degli effetti del caldo, ha evidenziato l'importanza di adottare comportamenti e misure di prevenzione per ridurre le conseguenze nocive delle ondate di calore. Per affrontare al meglio questa nuova ondata di caldo, è fondamentale seguire alcune semplici misure di prevenzione. Bere molta acqua, evitare l'esposizione diretta al sole nelle ore più calde della giornata e indossare abiti leggeri e traspiranti sono solo alcune delle raccomandazioni per proteggersi dalle alte temperature. Inoltre, è importante prestare particolare attenzione alle persone più vulnerabili, come anziani e bambini, che sono maggiormente a rischio di colpi di calore e disidratazione.

author: news@belfastlive.co.uk (Sophie McLaughlin)
title: Meet the 9-year-old singer performing with biggest names on NI country scene
text: Meet the 9-year-old who hopes to become one of the biggest stars on the thriving Northern Irish country music scene. Amber Campbell from [Co Armagh](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/all-about/co-armagh) has been singing as long as she has been talking and is ready to take the next step by releasing her first single. Her mother Mary said there is no stopping the schoolgirl who continues to make the proud at every performance. Read more: [24 things to do and see in Belfast in 2024](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/whats-on/24-things-see-belfast-2024-28368725) Read more: [37 big gigs coming up in Belfast in 2024](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife-news/37-big-gigs-coming-up-28377163) Speaking to Belfast Live, Mary said: "From a young age, we knew singing and music was something she was going to be massively interested in. "Amber started singing lessons at the age of four and then started her music grades two years ago and is now currently on her grade two. "She absolutely loves Owen Mac, Daniel O’Donnell and Lisa McHugh, they are her go-to tunes - her father's side of the family would be quite musical especially her granda Campbell who is no longer with us." Amber showcased her talent at the Balmoral Show this year and after coming second with her rendition of 'Jealous of the Angels', she caught the performance bug. "An opportunity came to sing at the Warrenpoint Festival in August where she sang at the Hugo Duncan Show and was taken on to sing with Country Music Showtime with Sean Wallace. "He has given her the opportunity to sing with another favourite of hers John Glenn and other upcoming artists who she has become quite friendly with and offer her great support, which has greatly developed her confidence," Mary explained. One of Amber's covers has received over 633k views on Facebook with Mary saying the family were "absolutely blown away by the response". She continued: "An email came through from the Northern Ireland Country Awards saying they had seen her video and asked if would she like to perform - she was absolutely blown away as it is such an honour for a 9-year-old and will be the youngest ever to perform at this event. "She is so excited about it as she will meet some of the biggest names in country music." Amber is going to Donegal this month where she will be releasing her first single. "Amber is a quiet girl who is quite grounded takes everything in her stride and enjoys all the simple things," her mother added. "2024 is going to be an exciting year with her new release and the country awards - she also has a few big bookings and charity events, she’s a busy girl but very excited to see where it all takes her. "As a parent it’s amazing to see your child on stage to get standing ovations and watch her grow with confidence, it’s truly amazing and we are all very proud of her."
